review_text: There's no option to increase the font size. Even after increasing the device font, still its too small. It's so uncomfortable to read . Further to go on the main detailed chart page. We had to go through and click at least 2-3 links. Then there's no option to save chart settings. No facility to trade currency derivatives also. This mobile app is not user and trader friendly. 03/02/26: I was expecting that company will respond to the review/concern/feedback. BIG SHOCKER. 😱

l liked the app. The UI and interface feels smooth and snappy. One thing I noticed is that my total returns was negative but my 1 day return was showing a positive value on the first day of buying a stock which is somewhat confusing.

when commodity activation failed ..it's keep showing activation in progress...unable to activate commodity account because we can't reset the process ...it's full of bugs development team need to look into it.. highly disappointed with support team ,,they are keep sending mails but not able to resolve the issue past 15 days ..waste supporting team..hope issue will be resolved asap...#grow web app developers.

Excellent app with one of the best user interfaces in its category. The design is clean, intuitive, and effortless to navigate, making regular market tracking smooth and efficient. It offers a rich depth of data and insights that clearly set it apart from other platforms, enabling more informed and confident analysis. Overall, a well-designed and reliable app that delivers great value for both beginners and experienced traders. Highly recommended. 👌👌 🙌 🙌
Sometimes the price of stocks are showing wrong. But to be honest groww has a very much user friendly UI than any other.
I would recommend this app to everyone. t Trading is your responsibility but the app provides you with the simplest and most insightful analysis and user interface.
really nice app for trading and sips. You can also get lot of information about market by lots of charts and nice representation of information.

updated version of Groww is one of the finest version of brokerage app for every segment of share market trading... trading assessment graf before trading is much helpful for a trader..... and many more options are there......

So far I have had a great & smooth experience on Groww, Have been using this app for I guess 1.5 to 2 years (Only for Mutual funds - SIP & Equity - Stocks) haven't really tried Intra day not a fan of it honestly.

In this app, I often face technical errors when trying to exit the market, and because I’m unable to exit on time, I end up incurring losses. I also have screenshots of the technical error, but there is no option to attach them here. otherwise, I would have attached them.

Groww is one of the best investment apps I’ve used. The interface is very simple and beginner-friendly, even for someone new to stocks and mutual funds. Account opening was smooth, transactions are fast, and portfolio tracking is very clear. I like how everything is explained in an easy way without confusion. Overall, a reliable platform for long-term investing. Highly recommended!

“All the available services are very good and easy to understand, but there is no option to buy U.S. stocks. If that option were also added, it would be even better. It would be great to have all services in one place within the app.”

2 issues with the app I am noticing lately 1. I was just checking how SIP works, and it immediately read the OTP from sms and booked the order, even though it was booked for future date I wasn't able to cancel it. 2. I accidentally clicked the F&O tab and then suddenly I clicked the activate button, there is no way to go back or deactivate it. Both of them are the cases of User experience manipulation. This should be avoided.

Groww is my first broker for conducting and managing investments. The UI is extremely intuitive for both Stocks and Mutual Funds, especially for beginners. Features like stock SIPs, price alerts for stocks of interest, related news, technical and foundational analyses, SIP update support for Mutual Funds help a lot. The brokerage fees is reasonably low. One enhancement suggestion is adding the same SIP update options as Mutual Funds, for stocks too. Very satisfied so far. Great job!

One of the worst customer support I've ever encountered. Support agents won't connect on time and close conversation without solving queries. It's been two days I am trying to solve problems with my account but I'm getting no help. Finally I've decided to close my account completely.

App is good, however some improvements. Nominee name entry has letter limit and hence cannot add full name as per a valid document. Also the last signing document is not available for zooming to counter check all details, conditions in microscopic letters prior the final agreement and signing.

Never use this app. It won't allow you to sell your stocks when you are in profit. Today I tried multiple times to sell my stock, but the app was showing no quantity available. If the stock is at a loss, the app will allow you to sell it. It happens occasionally, two to three times every month.

04/02/2026: Charged high brokarege & external charges also CDSL DP charges & charged Brokers dp charges on each trade trasanction daily.. .. 23/01//2024: App is not working properly, unable login through app or through website, suddenly in between working session any time it is off, no contact number, customer care not working, unable to contact any way to groww these are very worst case & very bad services.

Kudos for the Good work by the developer team behind the app. There are a few issues though. please provide option to read news as all/your stocks on groww website, like the app. Otherwise, it's confusing. also, pls provide easier navigation to news section on homepage instead of scrolling all the way down to Stocks in news.

Faced serious execution issues on Groww during intraday trading. When the stock price jumped and was clearly in profit the moment I clicked Exit the executed price dropped sharply turning it into a huge loss. To verify, I re-entered the same stock and placed a target at a very high price. The price visibly touched that level within seconds yet the order executed below my buy price again resulting in a huge loss. This happened multiple times. Clear mismatch between price shown and price executed

I have been using the app for last 3 years. I am happy except one thing. I can not sort my GTT orders based some criteria like buy, sell, alphabetical, order price close to market price. I requested groww to enhance their app with these features to help customers make quick decisions. But no use, Groww does not understand customer needs. i have been waiting for this update since 2+years. is it so difficult, I can do it in two days, give me the source code. or you are not interested to do.

I use 3 apps Groww, Zerodha Kite & Angel One. Groww is the most simple and easiest to use. For those who simply want to buy and sell after taking advice from others will enjoy Groww. In simple words Groww is for children above 18 years 😂. I am sorry to say but when I use this app I get very irritated because apart from buying and selling I have to refer to Zerodha and Angel One for other information. Some features are much better on Groww but still can't beat the other 2. Chart is horrible.

worst customer support system, 10 minutes are minimum when you call on their customer care no., after that the executives are completely morons, No call transfer system to concerned department. On email you will receive only one thing that they have raised ticket for that thing nothing else.

price of a stock was 220 Rs. And previous day price was 263 Rs. when I was selling the stock then it said I have to place order above 263 but price was 220. And due to this I couldn't sell stock and made heavy loss. very bad experience. Also the app didn't updated lower and upper circuit till mid day for that stock .

Please refer ETmoney you v/s market feature add something like that to understand how our mutual fund portfolio performing compared to market.. show comparison in returns and rankings with benchmark in addition to category average!!!. The MF stock portfolio doesn't get refreshed in time!!! each mutual fund performance should be seen over team just like portfolio line chart!!

For the last few days, I have been facing issues with my Groww app. Sometimes it does not work properly, and many times I have to restart the app repeatedly. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled the app several times, but the problem still remains the same. Please help me resolve this issue and let me know why this is happening.

Started well to gain the confidence of investors. But is slowly diminishing is its services. I hold accounts in other similar apps as well. Their services are doing good. Its not the same with Groww. Customer care is bad. No seriousness to greviences. Well, there are much better options and better apps. I dont think Ill get a response to this review. I suppose that will prove it all!!!

don't install this app for trading. there have lot of charges for brokerage. Sometimes also lagging. PROFIT amount lately added in account. there are some technical issues that are there. kindly resolve all issues please

My rating for groww app is very bad. I purchased Nippon India gold etf at 124. In order section, app show me pending order for 4 days and in 5th day my orders are vanished. I call customer care, they told me that there are no orders from this account. Told me to show screenshot of orders. Worst app ever💔💔😤😡

I tried to redeem my mutual funds. but the amount shown at redeem time and the money i got after 4 days have changed. instead of profits, i incurred losses. after a lot of discussion, I came to know that my redeem approved on other day. they took 5 days to deposit money with 0 profit. I am uninstalling app. thanks.

very Disppointed that app, because when i took Crude oil 5000 Put , my trade hang , i did not book my profit because grow application hang and Target price not updated. so it is very bad for any retail trader. 1 february 2026 also i lost my Ruppes, due to lagging price of option. i lost my 5 lacks due to lagging and Wrong price indication...

"The app is constantly lagging and freezing. Moreover, my data keeps disappearing or getting hidden automatically. It's a very frustrating experience. Please fix these performance issues and data visibility bugs."and costumer service is very bad.

App is easy to use, has many investment options and provides detailed information. But it seriously needs the option to create custom portfolios for SIPs. There is just no way to manage SIPs for specific goals. One would expect it to be a regular feature for an investment app.

app is good but brokerage on equity is much higher than any other that reason I give up this platform for always. collecting taxes like a cruel ruler.If I am given the option to transfer my shares to another platform, I would consider it a wrong path to leave.

Best application for investors no other extra charges and better for easy tracking, But to be conclude there are some glitch type problem as the one day return is showing much more then the real one day return price of positive or negative and secondly on application Stock balance showing correct but on website it's showing as negative balance just fix it too .

I had taken a BTST trade on Adani Green Energy put options. The market opened against me, and I tried to close my position immediately after the market opened, but neither the 1-minute chart updated nor was I able to close my position. As a result, I incurred a huge loss. I have seen such problems with the charts many times. This has happened to me twice. The Groww app is useless.

A well-designed app with powerful features and detailed charts that make analysis smooth and efficient. The platform feels thoughtful and capable, especially for active users. I’m enjoying the experience so far and look forward to exploring more features on both the mobile and web versions. Overall, a solid and reliable app with great potential.
auto squre off at -18% -9% is horrible... most of the time i face loss book...pls remove this settings. we cant do anything if auto squre value hits.

Using Groww since 2022 and my experience is very bad. This app feels like a trap for retail investors, especially intraday & F&O traders. Buy orders placed at ₹99 get executed near ₹102. Stop loss at ₹80 hits at ₹77, and targets at ₹125 hit at ₹123. These small differences ruin trading over time. The most important thing:-There is always balance mismatch with small adjustments which affect you on long term. Overall poor execution. Do not recommend.

Groww’s MTF service is highly unreliable and risky. Interest is deducted on time, but incorrect charges are routinely reversed only after complaints are raised. There are frequent app bugs, delayed or no customer support during critical trading hours, and zero accountability for losses caused by Groww’s system failures. This pattern raises serious concerns about transparency, internal controls, and compliance. MTF users must constantly monitor to avoid being financially harmed by Groww’s errors
